summary: The diff shows only two files modified: backend/main.mo (partially, with truncation) and project_state.json. The project_state.json only tracks feature request statuses (all still 'pending'), and the backend/main.mo shows structural changes with access control imports and helpers. However, the vast majority of requirements — especially all frontend requirements (REQ-1, REQ-2, REQ-3, REQ-5, REQ-6) — show no evidence of implementation. REQ-4 (backend security audit) has partial evidence in main.mo but the diff is truncated and all items in project_state.json remain 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a visible border/outline to all dashboard cards in Dashboard.tsx so each card is clearly delineated, using a consistent border style in both light and dark mode.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to Dashboard.tsx are present in the diff. The project_state.json lists this as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the existing dark/light mode toggle in Layout.tsx with a sun/moon icon switcher with aria-label and persistent theme preference.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes to Layout.tsx are present in the diff. The project_state.json lists this as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Standardize card dimensions across all pages (Dashboard, CertificationSelector, StudyMaterials, Flashcards, PracticeTest, QAPractice) using the largest card footprint as the standard.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend page files are modified in the diff. The project_state.json lists this as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Perform a thorough security audit of backend/main.mo covering access control, caller validation, cross-user data protection, integer overflow guards, and restricted public API surface.
missing_requirements.reason: While backend/main.mo was modified and includes access control imports and helpers, the diff is heavily truncated. It is unclear whether all required fixes were fully applied. The project_state.json still lists this as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: Frontend code review and security audit: input sanitization, safe rendering of user/AI content, consistent React Query error handling in useQueries.ts, and removal of sensitive console.log statements.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend files such as useQueries.ts or any component files are modified in the diff. The project_state.json lists this as 'pending'.

missing_requirements.requirement: GUI consistency audit across all pages: uniform typography, consistent spacing/padding, uniform button styles, adherence to light/dark theme tokens, and no broken layout elements.
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend page or component files are modified in the diff. The project_state.json lists this as 'pending'.
